# data format:
# year baseweight

# these values were generated by finding the average weight of the forwards who
# played more than half the games in the season and were in the top 60% in 
# points-per-game, then subtracting 58 pounds.  There is some 
# smoothing/averaging between years that goes into it, too...

# you can add more years if you need to
# weight values MUST be EVEN numbers
# MINIMUM allowed value is 102 (corresponds to average weight of 160 lbs)
# MAXIMUM allowed value is 152 (corresponds to average weight of 210 lbs)

1918  112
1919  112
1920  112
1921  112
1922  110
1923  110
1924  110
1925  110
1926  110
1927  110
1928  110
1929  108
1930  108
1931  108
1932  108
1933  108
1934  110
1935  110
1936  110
1937  112
1938  112
1939  114
1940  114
1941  114
1942  112
1943  112
1944  110
1945  110
1946  110
1947  112
1948  112
1949  112
1950  112
1951  112
1952  114
1953  114
1954  114
1955  116
1956  116
1957  116
1958  118
1959  120
1960  120
1961  120
1962  120
1963  122
1964  122
1965  122

1969  124
1970  124
1971  126
